nodes.documentation:
Smart contract to manage the auctions creation.
The constructor of an auction must be done from this contract manager.
It is possible to stop the creation of the auctions by set the variable
couldCreateAuction to false. In this way the manager can control the number
of active auctions and can destroy the contract manager.
In particular, to destroy the contract manager, no active auctions must
be in progress.
To save all addresses of the active auctions, a map and an array are used.
The index related to a specific auction address are saved in the map, using
the address as key (the index is incremented by one, and decremented by one
when needed, in such a way that the index 0 is not present in the map). When
an auction is deleted, the last auction in the array is moved in the position
of the deleted one and the length of the array is decremented by one.
nodes.name: AuctionManager
LogEngCreateAuction
LogVicCreateAuction

nodes.documentation:
Event emitted when the auction creation is disabled.
    * @param detail     explanation of the event.
nodes.name: LogStopAuctionCreation

nodes.documentation:
Event emitted when the auction creation is enabled.
    * @param detail     explanation of the event.
nodes.name: LogStartAuctionCreation

nodes.documentation:
Event emitted when the contract manager is destroyed.
    * @param detail     explanation of the event.
nodes.name: LogDestroied

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "It's no longer possible to create auctions!"

arguments.value: It's no longer possible to create auctions!

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "It's no longer possible to create auctions!"

nodes.documentation:
Modifier to avoid the creation of an auction when the
creation is disabled.
nodes.name: couldCreate

nodes.documentation: Modifier to permit only to the manager to controll the contract.
nodes.name: owner

nodes.documentation: Modifier to avoid that the manager create an auction.
nodes.name: notOwner

nodes.documentation:
Contract constructor, set the creation as enabled and save the
sender address as the manager.

nodes.documentation:
Vicrey auction creation. It call the constructor of the vicrey auction
and insert the new address in the map and in the array of auctions.
Emit a vicrey creation event.
    * @param resPrice       reserve price for the auction;
@param depositValue   deposit for the auction.
    * modifier couldCreate(): check if the creation is enabled.
    * modifier notOwner(): check that the sender is not the owner.
nodes.name: createVicreyAuction

nodes.documentation:
English auction deletion. It is called from the auction contract,
after check if the auction is present in the array, the last auction
in the array is moved in the position of the deleted one.
nodes.name: deleteEnglishAuction

nodes.documentation:
Vicrey auction deletion. It is called from the auction contract,
after check if the auction is present in the array, the last auction
in the array is moved in the position of the deleted one.
nodes.name: deleteVicreyAuction

nodes.documentation: Retrive all english active auctions.
nodes.name: getEnglishAuctions

nodes.documentation: Retrive all vicrey active auctions.
nodes.name: getVicreyAuctions

arguments.value: The auction creation is temporally stopped!

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "The auction creation is temporally stopped!"

nodes.documentation:
Disable the auction creation.
    * modifier owner(): check if the sender is the owner.
nodes.name: stopCreation

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "The auction creation is now available!"

arguments.value: The auction creation is now available!

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "The auction creation is now available!"

nodes.documentation:
Enable the auction creation.
    * modifier owner(): check if the sender is the owner.
nodes.name: startCreation

nodes.documentation:
Destroy the contract manager after checking that no auctions are active.
    * modifier owner(): check if the sender is the owner.
nodes.name: destroyManager

nodes.documentation:
Destroy the contract manager after checking that no auctions are active.
    * modifier owner(): check if the sender is the owner.
nodes.name: destroyManager

params.buyOut: buy out price for the auction;
params.incr: minimum bid increment for the auction.    * modifier couldCreate(): check if the creation is enabled.    * modifier notOwner(): check that the sender is not the owner.

params.depositValue: deposit for the auction.    * modifier couldCreate(): check if the creation is enabled.    * modifier notOwner(): check that the sender is not the owner.

methods.constructor: Contract constructor, set the creation as enabled and save the sender address as the manager.

createEnglishAuction(uint256,uint256,uin.notice: English auction creation. It call the constructor of the english auction and insert the new address in the map and in the array of auctions. Emit a english creation event.

createVicreyAuction(uint256,uint256).notice: Vicrey auction creation. It call the constructor of the vicrey auction and insert the new address in the map and in the array of auctions. Emit a vicrey creation event.

deleteEnglishAuction().notice: English auction deletion. It is called from the auction contract, after check if the auction is present in the array, the last auction in the array is moved in the position of the deleted one.

deleteVicreyAuction().notice: Vicrey auction deletion. It is called from the auction contract, after check if the auction is present in the array, the last auction in the array is moved in the position of the deleted one.

destroyManager().notice: Destroy the contract manager after checking that no auctions are active.    * modifier owner(): check if the sender is the owner.

startCreation().notice: Enable the auction creation.    * modifier owner(): check if the sender is the owner.

stopCreation().notice: Disable the auction creation.    * modifier owner(): check if the sender is the owner.

userdoc.notice: Smart contract to manage the auctions creation. The constructor of an auction must be done from this contract manager. It is possible to stop the creation of the auctions by set the variable couldCreateAuction to false. In this way the manager can control the number of active auctions and can destroy the contract manager. In particular, to destroy the contract manager, no active auctions must be in progress. To save all addresses of the active auctions, a map and an array are used. The index related to a specific auction address are saved in the map, using the address as key (the index is incremented by one, and decremented by one when needed, in such a way that the index 0 is not present in the map). When an auction is deleted, the last auction in the array is moved in the position of the deleted one and the length of the array is decremented by one.
